thread.title: Golf: Morgan Hoffmann climbs the leaderboard - Golf
thread.title_full: Golf: Morgan Hoffmann climbs the leaderboard - Golf - NorthJersey.com

author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS |
title: Golf: Morgan Hoffmann climbs the leaderboard - Golf
text:
LAS VEGAS — Brett Stegmaier topped the leaderboard Friday in the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open.
He was 6 under for the round and 11 under overall with three holes left when second-round play was suspended because of darkness.
Wyckoff's Morgan Hoffmann was a stroke back with Chad Campbell and Tyler Aldridge. Hoffmann shot his second straight 5-under 66. Campbell had a 4-under 67 and Aldridge had a 68.
Stegmaier eagled the par-5 16th on his opening nine and had four birdies on the 15 holes he was able to finish at TPC Summerlin.
Ji rallies into lead 
TAIPEI, Taiwan — Ji Eun-hee took a one-stroke lead over Lydia Ko in the LPGA Taiwan Championship, overcoming a double-bogey in windy and rainy conditions.
She finished with a 3-under 69 to reach 9-under 135 at Miramar. Ji had the double-bogey on the sixth, rallied with birdies on Nos. 9-11 and closed with seven straight pars. Ko shot a 67.
Wayne's Marina Alex shot a 74 and is 1-over par for the tournament.
